intro_1:
Explore and interact with folks. 
Solve puzzles in order to progress. 
You may need to fight with enemies aswell. 
Items will be useful.
intro_2:
Controls:
[Z] - Confirm/Interact
[X] - Discard/Close

To interact with the environment or choose an item from menu, use [Z]
To close a menu or open the game's menu, use [X]
Use [Shift] to walk faster.
intro_3: Some puzzles may require using your mouse. Don't forget to do so!
intro_4:
Enter your name please..
Use your keyboard. Enter to confirm.
